reporter_caption.center: STATE EX REL. BRAY v. HAMILTON FIXTURE CO., 112 Ohio St.3d 1466 (2007)

caption.center: State ex rel. Bray v. Hamilton Fixture Co.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Franklin App. No. 05AP-821, 2006-Ohio-4459.
opinion.opinion_text:
MISCELLANEOUS DISMISSALS This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Franklin County. Upon consideration of appellant's application for dismissal,
It is ordered by the court that the application for dismissal is granted. Accordingly, this cause is dismissed.Page 1467
ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS 1. J. Bernie Quilter and Adrian D. Peterson were reappointed to the Commission on the Rules of Superintendence for Ohio Courts.
2. Judge Richard M. Rogers was appointed to the Commission on Continuing Legal Education.
3. Mary Asbury was reappointed to the Board of Commissioners on Character and Fitness.
4. Ralph E. Cascarilla was appointed as a member of the Board of Bar Examiners.
5. Proposed amendments the Ohio Rules of Civil Procedure, the Ohio Rules of Criminal Procedure, and the Ohio Rules of Evidence have been published for public comment.
